title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.4 - Place of filing notices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.4 - Place of filing notices

State Regulations

The appropriate notice of retainer and appearance or
notice of substitution and appearance shall be filed with the local alcoholic
beverage control board or zone office of the authority at which the attorney
filing the same makes his first appearance in the proceeding or files, by mail
or otherwise, and application for a license or permit in behalf of his client. Where such notice is filed at a local alcoholic beverage control board, the
same shall be filed in duplicate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
80.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
